response.overview: Abduktio was a hardcore punk band from Ylöjärvi, Finland. Abduktio combined progressive rhythms and complex melodies to the vicious sound of hardcore punk, which was unheard of in the scene. The band's talent was recognized by the critics despite being in the margin due to the genre. Abduktio disbanded in 2011 after the founding member, composer and guitarist Jukka "Zuge" Laajakallio committed suicide after suffering from severe mental health issues. The band was preparing their 3rd album. The documentary follows the band from 2015 onward as they become Abduktio once more to finish the four songs they had composed with Laajakallio before his death. Abduktio: Maailmanloppua odotellessa documentary tells the story of growing up together in a band and how producing one last record affects grieving.
response.title: Abduktio: Maailmanloppua odotellessa
